newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia makes first launch from new cosmodrome.
newsitem.headline: Russia makes first launch from new cosmodrome.

text.p: Russia staged the first launch from its new Svobodny cosmodrome in the country's far east on Tuesday, sending a military satellite into orbit aboard a modified SS-25 ballistic missile.

The Start-1 rocket was launched at 0200 GMT from the cosmodrome, which is still under construction at a former strategic nuclear missile base on the Siberian taiga about 9,000 km (6,000 miles) east of Moscow.
